move-content-locate-your-objective-5: On a miss, your objective falls out of reach, you have been misled about the nature of your objective, or you discover that this site holds unexpected depths. If you continue your exploration, clear all but one filled progress and raise the site’s rank by one (if not already epic).
move-content-make-camp-1: When you rest and recover for several hours in the wild, roll +supply.
move-content-make-camp-2: On a strong hit, you and your allies may each choose two.
move-list-make-camp-1: Recuperate: Take +1 health for you and any companions.
move-list-make-camp-2: Partake: Suffer -1 supply and take +1 health for you and any companions.
move-list-make-camp-5: Prepare: When you break camp, add +1 if you Undertake a Journey.
move-content-make-camp-4: On a miss, you take no comfort. Pay the Price.
move-content-mark-your-failure-1: When you make a move and score a miss, mark a tick on your failure track. If you score a miss when making a progress move, mark two ticks.
move-content-out-of-supply-1: When your supply is exhausted (reduced to 0), mark unprepared. If you suffer additional -supply while unprepared, you must exchange each additional -supply for any combination of -health, -spirit or -momentum as appropriate to the circumstances.
move-content-pay-the-price-1: When you suffer the outcome of a move, choose one.
move-list-pay-the-price-1: Make the most obvious negative outcome happen.
move-list-pay-the-price-2: Envision two negative outcomes. Rate one as ‘likely’, and Ask the Oracle using the yes/no table. On a ‘yes’, make that outcome happen. Otherwise, make it the other.
move-list-pay-the-price-3: Roll on the table below. If you have difficulty interpreting the result to fit the current situation, roll again.
move-content-reach-a-milestone-1: When you make significant progress in your quest by overcoming a critical obstacle, completing a perilous journey, solving a complex mystery, defeating a powerful threat, gaining vital support, or acquiring a crucial item, you may mark progress.
move-content-reach-your-destination-2: When your journey comes to an end, roll the challenge dice and compare to your progress. Momentum is ignored on this roll.
move-content-reach-your-destination-3: On a strong hit, the situation at your destination favors you. Choose one.
move-list-reach-your-destination-1: Make another move now (not a progress move), and add +1.
move-content-reach-your-destination-4: On a weak hit, you arrive but face an unforeseen hazard or complication. Envision what you find (Ask the Oracle if unsure).
move-content-reach-your-destination-5: On a miss, you have gone hopelessly astray, your objective is lost to you, or you were misled about your destination. If your journey continues, clear all but one filled progress, and raise the journey’s rank by one (if not already epic).
move-content-resupply-1: When you hunt, forage, or scavenge, roll +wits.
move-content-resupply-2: On a strong hit, you bolster your resources. Take +2 supply.
move-content-resupply-3: On a weak hit, take up to +2 supply, but suffer -1 momentum for each.
move-content-resupply-4: On a miss, you find nothing helpful. Pay the Price.
move-content-reveal-a-danger-1: When you encounter a risky situation within a site, envision the danger or roll on the following table.
move-content-reveal-a-danger-alt-1: When you encounter a risky situation within a site, envision the danger or roll on the following table.
move-content-secure-an-advantage-1: When you assess a situation, make preparations, or attempt to gain leverage, envision your action and roll. If you act...`
move-list-secure-an-advantage-1-1: With speed, agility, or precision: Roll +edge.
move-list-secure-an-advantage-1-2: With charm, loyalty, or courage: Roll +heart.
move-list-secure-an-advantage-1-3: With aggressive action, forceful defense, strength, or endurance: Roll +iron.
move-list-secure-an-advantage-1-4: With deception, stealth, or trickery: Roll +shadow.
move-list-secure-an-advantage-1-5: With expertise, insight, or observation: Roll +wits.
move-content-secure-an-advantage-2: On a strong hit, you gain advantage. Choose one.
move-list-secure-an-advantage-2-1: Take control: Make another move now (not a progress move), and add +1.
move-content-secure-an-advantage-3: On a weak hit, your advantage is short-lived. Take +1 momentum.
move-content-secure-an-advantage-4: On a miss, you fail or your assumptions betray you. Pay the Price.
move-content-sojourn-1: When you spend time in a community seeking assistance, roll +heart. If you share a bond, add +1.
move-content-sojourn-2: On strong hit, you and your allies may each choose two from within the categories below. On a weak hit, choose one. If you share a bond, choose one more.
move-content-sojourn-3: On a hit, you and your allies may each focus on one of your chosen recover actions and roll +heart again. If you share a bond, add +1. On a strong hit, take +2 more for that action. On a weak hit, take +1 more. On a miss, it goes badly and you lose all benefits for that action.
move-list-sojourn-1-1: Mend: Clear a wounded debility and take +1 health.
move-list-sojourn-1-2: Hearten: Clear a shaken debility and take +1 spirit.
move-list-sojourn-1-3: Equip: Clear an unprepared debility and take +1 supply.
move-list-sojourn-2-1: Recuperate: Take +2 health for yourself and any companions.
move-list-sojourn-3-1: Take a quest: Envision what this community needs, or what trouble it is facing (Ask the Oracle if unsure). If you chose to help, Swear an Iron Vow and add +1.
move-content-sojourn-7: On a miss, you find no help here. Pay the Price.
move-content-strike-1: When you have initiative and attack in close quarters, roll +iron. When you have initiative and attack at range, roll +edge.
move-content-strike-2: On a strong hit, inflict +1 harm. You retain initiative.
move-content-strike-3: On a weak hit, inflict your harm and lose initiative.
move-content-strike-4: On a miss, your attack fails and you must Pay the Price. Your foe has initiative.
move-content-swear-an-iron-vow-1: When you swear upon iron to complete a quest, write your vow and give the quest a rank. Then, roll +heart. If you make this vow to a person or community with whom you share a bond, add +1.
move-content-swear-an-iron-vow-2: On a strong hit, you are emboldened and it is clear what you must do next (Ask the Oracle if unsure). Take +2 momentum.
move-content-swear-an-iron-vow-3: On a weak hit, you are determined but begin your quest with more questions than answers. Take +1 momentum, and envision what you do to find a path forward.
move-content-swear-an-iron-vow-4: On a miss, you face a significant obstacle before you can begin your quest. Envision what stands in your way (Ask the Oracle if unsure), and choose one.
move-list-swear-an-iron-vow-1: You press on: Suffer -2 momentum, and do what you must to overcome this obstacle.
move-list-swear-an-iron-vow-2: You give up: Forsake Your Vow.
move-content-take-a-hiatus-1: When you spend an extended time recovering in a safe place while a threat is active, do any of the following.
move-list-take-a-hiatus-2: Set your health, spirit, supply, and companion health to their maximum values.
move-list-take-a-hiatus-3: Set your momentum to its reset value.
move-content-take-a-hiatus-2: Then, for each active threat, Advance a Threat.
move-content-test-your-bond-1: When your bond is tested through conflict, betrayal, or circumstance, roll +heart.
move-content-test-your-bond-2: On a strong hit, this test has strengthened your bond. Choose one.
move-content-test-your-bond-3: On a weak hit, your bond is fragile and you must prove your loyalty. Envision what they ask of you (Ask the Oracle if unsure), and do it (or Swear an Iron Vow). If you refuse or fail, clear the bond and Pay the Price.
move-content-test-your-bond-4: On a miss, or if you have no interest in maintaining this relationship, clear the bond and Pay the Price.
move-content-turn-the-tide-1: Once per fight, when you risk it all, you may steal initiative from your foe to make a move (not a progress move). When you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
move-content-turn-the-tide-2: If you fail to score a hit on that move, you must suffer a dire outcome. <em>Pay the Price.
move-content-undertake-a-journey-1: When you travel across hazardous or unfamiliar lands, set the rank of your journey.
move-content-undertake-a-journey-2: Then, for each segment of your journey, roll +wits. If you are setting off from a community with which you share a bond, add +1 to your initial roll.
move-content-undertake-a-journey-3: On a strong hit, you reach a waypoint. If the waypoint is unknown to you, envision it (Ask the Oracle if unsure). Then, choose one.
move-list-undertake-a-journey-2-1: You make good use of your resources: Mark progress.
move-list-undertake-a-journey-2-2: You move at speed: Mark progress and take +1 momentum, but suffer -1 supply.
move-content-undertake-a-journey-4: On a weak hit, you reach a waypoint and mark progress, but suffer -1 supply.
move-content-undertake-a-journey-5: On a miss, you are waylaid by a perilous event. Pay the Price.
move-content-wield-a-rarity-1: When you make a move aided by an augmented asset, roll your rarity die in place of your action die.
move-content-wield-a-rarity-2: On any result with 6 showing on the rarity die, the power of the rarity manifests in a dramatic and obvious way. You score an automatic strong hit and take +1 momentum.
move-content-wield-a-rarity-3: On a hit with 5 showing on the rarity die, the power of the rarity manifests in a subtle way. Take +1 momentum.
move-content-wield-a-rarity-4: On a miss with 1 showing on the rarity die, the rarity’s power fails or works against you.
move-content-write-your-epilogue-2: When you retire from your life as Ironsworn, envision two things: What you hope for, and what you fear. Then, roll the challenge dice and compare to your bonds. Momentum is ignored on this roll.
move-content-write-your-epilogue-3: On a strong hit, things come to pass as you hoped.
move-content-write-your-epilogue-4: On a weak hit, your life takes an unexpected turn, but not necessarily for the worse. You find yourself spending your days with someone or in a place you did not foresee. Envision it (Ask the Oracle if unsure).
move-content-write-your-epilogue-5: On a miss, your fears are realized.
